snippet: Utah quarterback Jordan Wynn quit after a fourth shoulder injury. Purdue quarterback Robert Marve his left anterior cruciate ligament again and will be out at least a few weeks.
lead_paragraph: Utah quarterback Jordan Wynn quit after a fourth shoulder injury. Purdue quarterback Robert Marve his left anterior cruciate ligament again and will be out at least a few weeks.

headline.seo: Utah Quarterback Jordan Wynn Quits After Fourth Injury
headline.main: College Quarterbacks Out, One for Good
